segments.text: Oh , it ’ s the latest novel by ray blue . It ’ s a sic-fi thriller .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought he usually wrote horror books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He does . He ’ s good at this genre too . It ’ s a captivating read .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ re going to the bookshop . Would you like to join us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would . I need to buy a textbook for my course and , as you know , I love browsing through the latest paperbacks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me too . I need something to read on the flight to new york . I can never sleep on planes . Sarah wants to pick up some children ’ s books for her daughter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to look at nelson Mandela ’ s autobiography .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is sure to be a worthwhile read .
segments.speaker: S1
